title: Bulgaria–Vietnam relations
text:
Bulgaria–Vietnam relations are foreign relations between <a href="Bulgaria">Bulgaria</a> and <a href="Vietnam">Vietnam</a>. 
Both countries established diplomatic relation on February 8, 1950. Bulgaria has an embassy in <a href="Hanoi">Hanoi</a>. Vietnam has an embassy in <a href="Sofia">Sofia</a>.
Cooperation.
In 2006, the Bulgarian Government agreed to a healthcare cooperation plan with Vietnam. The two-year plan includes cooperation in many areas, mainly in public healthcare, inpatient and outpatient help, <a href="food%20security">food security</a>, medical education.
